sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function WorkExp() { return (

Work Experience

Development Engineer Intern

Signify | Internship | Oct 2022 - Jun 2023 | 9 mos

  • Collaborated with a team of skilled professionals to develop and enhance Meeting Room and Desk Booking Applications using the Angular framework and Cordova for cross-platform compatibility.
  • Applied Agile software development methodologies, actively participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to ensure efficient project execution.
  • Showcased proficiency in enhancing the application by incorporating new features, and utilizing Angular components, services, and routing to deliver a smooth and intuitive user experience.
  • Resolved critical customer issues promptly by investigating, debugging, and implementing effective solutions while ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
  • Conducted thorough testing of the application, identifying and fixing bugs to deliver a reliable and error-free product.
  • Maintained code quality by following solid principles, employing modular design patterns, and writing clean, maintainable code.

Associate Software Engineer

Techvaria Solutions | Full Time | Apr 2021 - Oct 2021 | 6 mos

  • Collaborated closely with a team of software engineers, effectively optimizing design and ensuring the functionality of software projects.
  • Supported comprehensive software testing at various levels, actively participating in test planning, execution, and defect tracking.
  • Played a vital role in the development of two commercial software projects, utilizing Deluge and Zoho Creator (PaaS) to deliver robust and efficient solutions.
  • Actively involved in providing end-user support, addressing queries, and troubleshooting issues promptly to ensure optimal user satisfaction.
  • Demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills, identifying and resolving technical challenges to maintain the smooth operation of the software.

); }
